description: Conduct internal and external penetration testing engagements across web, APIs, mobile, and infrastructure environments. Drive DevSecOps initiatives including secure SDLC integration, CI/CD security reviews, and threat modelling. Represent cybersecurity in IT change enablement reviews and contribute to enterprise-level risk decisions while coordinating cross-team security efforts.

Conducted structured VAPT assessments across applications and infrastructure. Performed business logic testing, authentication and authorization analysis, and API security reviews. Delivered actionable remediation guidance to engineering teams and supported ISO 27001 compliance evidence preparation.

Started in security operations center (SOC) supporting 24/7 monitoring, incident triage, and vulnerability management, while gradually contributing to application security assessments. This period built foundational visibility into detection engineering, attack patterns, and enterprise security controls.

Deliver security assessments for SaaS platforms including web application testing, API reviews, and DevSecOps advisory. Support in integrating practical security validation into fast-moving engineering environments.
